channel.title: [TUT] Pinging using CMD in Microsoft Windows
channel.description: Simple as it is first time in ping in cmd (to run cmd go to start--->run-->cmd) [IMG]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d112/Coolnoob/Isee.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d112/Coolnoob/Isee2.jpg[/img] to get all your commands, to ping, simply do ping -t AddressHere and press Ctrl+C to stop...Show off to your friends! Be like im a l33t hax0r. [IMG]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d112/Coolnoob/isee3.jpg[/img] Woot woot...

item.title: [TUT] Pinging using CMD in Microsoft Windows
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Coolnoob55, post:7, topic:3400”][quote author=Ron link=topic=4027.msg39818#msg39818 date=1148853934]
lol yeah most people do know.

When I first learnt about pinging, I typed in…

ping yahoo.com

and then i got all excited when i got information back lol. This was befor Windows 95 when we had DOS.
[/quote]
Hmm must mean I’m falling behind…To the tv…woot woot…[/quote]

Hehe, TV wont tell you much. But forums will I find that everything I knoe wabout computers comes from forums.

item.title: [TUT] Pinging using CMD in Microsoft Windows
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

solemage2:

why would friends call u a l33t hax0r? most people on here know how to do same thing, but what u didnt add was u can go to websites doing the same thing, ping the site and type in something with its ip and u go there…

Is it my English or is it just you? What I meant to be like
Coolnoob55: Sup Bitch
Friend: Sup
Coolnoob55: Watch my “l33t hacking” skills
Friend: Shit!
Hope that helped ya =\

Read full topic

@Coolnoob55 wrote:

Simple as it is first time in ping in cmd (to run cmd go to start—>run–>cmd)


to get all your commands, to ping, simply do ping -t AddressHere and press Ctrl+C to stop…Show off to your friends! Be like im a l33t hax0r.
